main event: The witness, a 32-year-old male, observed a saucer-shaped craft in Cupertino, California on March 5, 1965.
interesting points: The object was able to hover steadily and then accelerate at a speed much faster than any known aircraft.
The object remained in the witness's field of vision for approximately 2-3 minutes before accelerating and disappearing from view within a few seconds.
The witness believes the object exhibited characteristics more in keeping with an extraterrestrial craft than any known terrestrial aircraft.
The witness is convinced the object was not a conventional aircraft, helicopter, satellite, or any other known aerial device.
The witness estimated the object to be about 6-8 feet in diameter at an estimated distance of 1/2 mile.
